testsuite.name: com.moviekim.ansimtalk_server.AnsimtalkServerApplicationTests

testcase.name: FCM 알림 전송 요청 실행 테스트
testcase.failure:
Wanted but not invoked: firebaseMessaging.send( <any com.google.firebase.messaging.Message> ); -> at com.google.firebase.messaging.FirebaseMessaging.send(FirebaseMessaging.java:90) Actually, there were zero interactions with this mock.
